description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Prawns With Citrus Fennel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Prawns With Citrus Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and segment grapefruit and oranges over a large bowl to catch juices. Place segments in bowl.
In a seperate bowl, combine seasoning and half the oil. Add prawns and turn to coat.
Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Cook prawns, turning, for 3-4 minutes or until prawns are just cooked through.
Meanwhile, add lettuce, fennel, mint, chives and remaining oil to bowl with citrus segments and juice and toss to combine. Serve prawns with salad.
